description: Archipela-Go is an exercise game designed around walking or jogging outside to unlock progression

0.4.0.description:
See [readme](https://github.com/aki665/react-native-archipelago/blob/archipela-go/README.md) for features.

First release of a playable version of Archipela-Go.
0.4.0.title: Archipela-Go 0.4.0 (First playable version)

0.4.1.description:
## App
### New features
- Moved saved settings to their own screen and added some settings
- Added descriptions of the settings to the [readme](https://github.com/aki665/react-native-archipelago/blob/archipela-go/README.md)

### Fixes
- Fixed allsanity goal happening on initial connection
- Added fallback to make location placement faster and more reliable
- Made unsecure WebSocket connections possible
- Fixed deleting saved info not deleting everything
- Hopefully prevented saved locations from disappearing
- Added more safety to reconnection to (hopefully) prevent multiple connections at a time
- Added a sanity check to prevent locations appearing at coordinates 0, 0

## Yaml
 - Changed the yaml to support Archipelago version 0.5.1
 - Removed start inventory, that was left in by accident.
0.4.1.title: Archipela-Go 0.4.1

0.4.2.description:
## App
### New features
- Added setting for location radius

### Fixes
- Added a check to prevent locations from being in private areas

## APWorld (by @agilbert1412)
The APWorld has been updated to fix some clients being unable to connect to games with Archipela-Go.
### Changelog
- Changed the trip generation algorithm to take into considerations the maximum amounts of each type of trips
- Added progressively smaller maximums to various trip templates, to consider the fact that the more difficult the trip, the fewer it's possible to roll of it simply because you also need to roll all previous tiers
- Datapackage size significantly reduced (120 000 -> 4300) (approximately)
0.4.2.title: Archipela-Go 0.4.2

0.5.0.description:
**NOTE: Saved connections made in previous versions of the app may not work correctly. If you have any ongoing games and want to update, please delete your saved connection and let the app make new locations.**

### New features
- Replaced the connection timeout with an automatic reconnection setting
- Removed the possibility to connect without saving the info, as the feature does not seem to work correctly
	-  This will come back at a later date if I can make it work
-  Added a list of hinted keys to the location info pop up
- Added new icons for hinted locations
	- The [pleading eyes](https://github.com/aki665/react-native-archipelago/blob/archipela-go/assets/APMarker_Hint.png) marker will show up if a hinted location contains a progression or useful item
- Added location retries setting
	- Sets the amount of times a location should be re-rolled in case of duplicates
- Added support for multiple item item classifications (e.g. Progression & useful)

### Fixes
- Made re-roll handling work even if the app is put into the background
- Made duplicate markers move a bit, so that they are not literally on top of each other
- Fixes to checking locations
	- Checked locations are correctly sent to the server on a reconnection
	- Checked locations are saved properly and sent when connecting to a saved slot
- Made the status bar have black text
- Fixed the app not generating locations if they were missing from saved data
- Made location generation continue, even if connection to the ap server was lost
- The client does not disconnect immediately when the app is put into the background
- When a disconnect happens, the app does not get stuck in a reconnect loop, or connect multiple times (causing duplicated messages)
0.5.0.title: Archipela-Go 0.5.0

0.5.1.description:
### New features
- Added a hints list
- Added client commands /help and /received

### Fixes
- Hopefully fixed locations not sending
- Added more checks to hopefully prevent locations appearing at 0,0
	- Additionally made those locations not trigger a reroll cooldown
- Added a border between chat messages for better clarity
- Small improvement to location generation
0.5.1.title: Archipela-Go 0.5.1

0.5.2.description:
## New features
- Added a button to the map screen to refresh the location tracking. 
- Added a button to the location info popup to manually send a location.
- Added an option to allow sending a location regardless of current position or keys.

# Update 0.5.2.1
## Fixes
- Fixed re-rolling a location not moving the visual marker
0.5.2.title: Archipela-Go 0.5.2

0.5.3.description:
## App
### New features
- Added a popup that shows generation progress when generating locations

### Fixes & Improvements
- Tried to make location markers show up every time
- Made refresh button reload the markers
- Added option to continue in offline mode if the connection to the Archipelago server is lost (hopefully fixing #12)
- Fixed location info popup showing hints for different worlds
- More preventions to locations showing up at 0,0

## APWorld (by @agilbert1412)
### Changelog
- Added item groups for macguffins (by @SunCatMC)
0.5.3.title: Archipela-Go 0.5.3

0.6.0.description:
### New features
- On a re-roll, you will be asked if you want to add the location to the list of banned locations.
- Added settings to control location placement. They are located in a new screen accessed from the settings screen.
	- The allowed angle of location placement
	- Removing locations from the list of banned locations
	- Home location, which is used as the center for location placement
- Added a popup that shows the current goal and the progress towards it.

### Fixes & Improvements
- Better fix to the location markers not appearing on connection.
0.6.0.title: Archipela-Go 0.6.0

0.6.1.description:
### New features
- Added sound effects and a setting controlling them
- Added a toggle to disable automatic location sending
0.6.1.title: Archipela-Go! 0.6.1

0.6.2.description:
## App
### New features
- Added a setting to keep the phone screen on while connected

### Fixes & Improvements
- Made the screen not fall asleep while generating locations
- Fixed the location generation sometimes stopping
- Added saving and loading to location generation. This allows the generation to continue, instead of starting over in case of a disconnect.

## APWorld (by @agilbert1412)
### Changelog
- Changed the default goal, and added some documentation on the settings that aren't implemented yet

## Yaml
- Updated the yaml to Archipelago version 6.3
0.6.2.title: Archipela-Go! 0.6.2

0.7.0r2.description:
## App
### Fixes & Improvements
- Changed the API used for generating locations to the Overpass API. This should help with generating locations in rural places and might speed up the generation. Fixes #14 

For some reason, the file size of the apk increased massively for this release (67.8 MB -> 108 MB). I'll look into lowering the file size for the next release.

## APWorld (by @agilbert1412)
### Changelog
- Rebased from latest main to get up to date checks, tests and asserts
- Fixed an internal issue with slot data and failing a core assert
0.7.0r2.title: Archipela-Go! 0.7.0
